headline.main: Christie Mentor Set for Sentencing in United Bribery Case
headline.print_headline: Christie Mentor Set for Sentencing in United Bribery Case

lead_paragraph: A former New Jersey attorney general and mentor to Republican New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie is scheduled to be sentenced in federal court.
snippet: A former New Jersey attorney general and mentor to Republican New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie is scheduled to be sentenced in federal court....
